standard.description: Standards for correctly implementing Redwood patterns

test.test_name: Smart filter regions are correctly configured
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.display_position  not in ('Smart Filters & Search', 'Smart Filters')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is in the wrong display position : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.display_position) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is in the wrong display position', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.source_type = 'Smart Filters'
test.explanation: Any regions of source type `Smart Filters` should be in the display position `Smart Filters & Search` or `Smart Filters`. As of the time of this writing, the 2 region templates that represent these display positions are `Page Header` and `Collection Toolbar`, so consider placing your region in a region of these template types.
